ack.p: We thank Delfina Mazzuca for preparation of bacterial superantigens, Tunyalux Langsub for her assistance with figures, and other members of the Haeryfar Laboratory for helpful discussions. We are grateful to Dr. Jonathan Yewdell (National Institutes of Health) for critically reviewing our manuscript and to Dr. Suzanne Epstein (Food and Drug Administration) for her expert advice on detection of IAV-specific antibodies.
